sentence.text: To examine if CRC patients have altered decorin levels, expression of decorin and its target genes, endothelial cell morphogenesis and vascular endothelial growth factor A (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II), were analyzed in their tumors.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Compared to normal tissues, decorin expression was reduced in CRC patients' tumors, while there were increased Met and negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II levels.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
